revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=LaCie |model=5Big |revision=Network 2 |is_manuf=No |price=375 |est_release_date=12/2010 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=8.33 |pwr_conn=DIN |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L4005CMI-12G |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR-S6C |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=7 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J9 |serial=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=High Performance CPLD;Altera;EPM3064A;;1;,,, 4Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;STMicro;M24C04WP;;1;,,, 4 Port SATA II Multiplier;Marvell;88SM4140;;2;,,, USB 2.0 HIgh Speed 2-Por Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2512A;;1;,,, 30V, 12.5A N-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power;AP9408AGM;;2;,,, 30V, 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435;;1;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;2;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;1; |flags=fan, eSATA, metal case |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=Debian |oui_eth=00:D0:4B }} {{TagLine|LaCie 5Big Network 2}} :[https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/5big-network-2/ Support page]
"LaCie SA 5BIG-NAS V2" and "Rev C" are silkscreened on the board. {{See also|LaCie 2Big NAS|LaCie d2 Network 2|LaCie}}
* [http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=5big_network_2 ''Lacie 5big Network v2'' on '''LaCie-NAS Wiki'''] :;Hardware :SoC: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 (A1) ''Kirkwood'' :CPU: ARM926EJ-S (ARMv5TE) @1200MHz :RAM: 512MB SDRAM memory (DDR2 @400MHz) :Flash: 512KB SPI NOR (Macronix MX25L4005CMI-12G) :2x USB 2.0 ports, 2x Ethernet Gigabit port (PHY [[Marvell]] 88E1116R) :5x SATA ports: 1x SATA port multiplier x2 (''JMicron'' JMB350 rev A/B) and :1x SATA port multiplier x3; 2x eSATA connectors; 1x Mini PCIe (unsoldered) :Serial: TTL Serial interface (3.3V); I2C EEPROM, 512 bytes (24C04 type) :2x bi-color (blue and red) disk LEDs with CPLD SATA activity blink :1x bi-color (blue and red) front LED :Front push button, Rear power switch
===Specifications=== * Network Storage 5-bay :Processor: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 (Kirkwood) @1.2GHz :Memory: 256MB DDR3; Hard drives: 2x 3.5" (SATA) :LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E116E GbE (10/100/1000) :Ports: 2x GbE (RJ45), 2x USB 2.0, 2x eSATA
===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/31362-lacie-5-big-network-2-reviewed ''LaCie 5 Big Network 2 Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (December 2010) *[https://www.storagereview.com/review/lacie-5big-network-2-review ''LaCie 5big Network 2 Review'' on '''StorageReview'''] (September 2011) *[https://www.smallbusinesscomputing.com/testdrive/article.php/10728_3939446_2/Storage-Server-Review-LaCie-5big-Network-2.htm ''Storage Server Review: LaCie 5big Network 2'' on '''SmallBusinessComputing'''] (September 2011) *[https://lowendmac.com/2013/lacie-5big-network-2-network-storage-with-some-quirks/ ''LaCie 5big Network 2: Network Storage with Some Quirks'' on '''LowEndMac'''] (May 2013)
